Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: Load this HTML and select the text "What color is this div?".
What color is this div?
Actual Results: The div background is darker than the selected text background. Expected Results: The background color of the div should have the same background of the selected text. Here is a bug in Orion that is affected by this problem. https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=344751

comments.text: Note that Chrome, Safari and Opera map Hightlight to the background of selected text (lighter color). Firefox is the only one mapping to the darker color.

comments.raw_text: I came across this bug as well (bug#240320). There is a mac specific color in FF for the alternate primary highlight (-moz-mac-alternateprimaryhighlight), which is the darker color.  I could not find a mac specific color name for the lighter color.
